body.p: 1. Joseph’s son from Issachar’s tribe and one of the 12 spies sent by Moses to search out Canaan (Nm 13:7).
2. Nathan’s son and one of David’s mighty men (2 Sm 23:36). In 1 Chronicles 11:38 he is called Joel, Nathan’s brother (in Hebrew, only one letter different from Igal).
3. Shemaiah’s son and a descendant of King David through King Jehoiachin (1 Chr 3:22).
